extendedInfo.description: Now, you do not need to remember all your business deal points discussed over phone as your instant call recorder takes care of it in a cautious way!Record your business/personal call from any corner of the world by downloading this application. We value the importance of your business deals and conversations and thus aid you with a facility of Call Recording with our useful Android application.How does it Work?It automatically starts recording the call once the user picks up the call from his device. The call recording begins in the background and gets automatically saved in the call recorder log in the specific contact folder.Features:â¢ Call Recording Enable/Disableâ¢ Set Audio Formatâ¢ Set Audio Sourceâ¢ Auto Speaker Enable/Disableâ¢ Selected Contact Record â¢ Selected Contact Ignore â¢ Facility to Send Call Record logs via Emailâ¢ Call Log DisplayIn order to give you a free app and keep developing more free apps in the future, we are integrating a search tool to our application. This will add a few access points to your device (hence the permissions) to direct you to the web search service. Please consider using the search to help us keep creating apps. You may delete the search icon, bookmark and homepage easily. Thank you

reviews.title: Another disappointment
reviews.comment: I am not going to try and rubbish/trash your work. Maybe your app is good but it did not work on my phone. You need to provide a list of devices on which your app has been found to work successfully. Google should work on making it mandatory for app developers to provide a verified list of devices that an app has been found to work successfully on.
